name: MediaModeration
author: Core Platform & Trust and Safety Teams

MediaModerationDeveloperMode.description: If the extension is in developer mode. Make sure this is false in production.

MediaModerationAddToScanTableOnUpload.description: If MediaModeration will add to the mediamoderation_scan table on upload. Useful to set to false when bulk adding files in local environment.

MediaModerationSendThumbnails.description: Whether photo should be thumbnailed before sending it to PhotoDNA.

MediaModerationThumbnailSize.description: The width and height of the thumbnail.

MediaModerationPhotoDNASubscriptionKey.description: Key for access to PhotoDNA service endpoint.

MediaModerationRecipientList.description: List of emails to be notified when suspicious content is detected.

MediaModerationFrom.description: Email from which notification are sent.

MediaModerationHttpProxy.description: HTTP proxy to use when calling PhotoDNA service.
